snippet: The German group Ensemble Musikfabrik is reviving “Delusion of the Fury,” a masterwork by the composer Harry Partch that requires an unusual set of instruments.
abstract: German new music group Ensemble Musikfabrik commission instrument maker Thomas Meixner to build set of music-making gizmos designed by late unconventional composer Harry Partch; group will perform City Center concert of Partch’s rarely heard works, unique for their 43-note tonal system, using Meixner’s replicas of whimsical contraptions invented by the microtonal composer pioneer.
lead_paragraph: The German group Ensemble Musikfabrik is reviving “Delusion of the Fury,” a masterwork by the composer Harry Partch that requires an unusual set of instruments.

headline.main: Reviving a Harry Partch Work With Hubcaps and Wine Bottles
headline.print_headline: Reviving a Work With Hubcaps and Wine Bottles
